name: Napobination
storyline: The submarine mafia has taken control of Naples, throw your firecrackers to defeat the mafia's army of crabs, make new allies and become stronger, will you be able to defeat the mafia boss?
summary: An action-rpg set in Naples, save the city from the local mafia who created an army of gigant crabs, use your skills to save your friends and fight bosses!

videos.name: Gameplay Trailer
videos.title: NAPOBINATION, IL VIDEOGIOCO SU NAPOLI! (Gameplay trailer)
